pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company Pink Pomelo Hand Cream 75ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Treat hands to the many benefits of Hemp Seed Oil, to moisturise, soften and hydrate even the most distressed hands. This non-greasy, formulation, made with natural ingredients, gives hands a luxurious hand spa treatment without visiting a salon.

Warnings

Avoid Contact with eyes. Not for Internal use.

Common Uses

Moisturise, soften and hydrate hands

Ingredients

Water(Aqua), Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter), Glycerin, Glyceryl Stearate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Cetearyl Alcohol, Theobroma Cacao Seed (Cocoa) Butter, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Potassium cetyl phosphate, Xanthan Gum, Triticum Vulgare germ (Wheatgerm) Oil, Panthenol, Tocopheryl acetate (Vitamin E), Benzyl Alcohol, Ginkgo Biloba Leaf Extract, Chamomile Recutita Extract, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Parfum (Fragrance)

Directions

Apply a small amount to hands, and rub hands together ensuring that the cream disperses over the entire hand, front and back. Continue to rub in until the cream is absorbed. Avoid contact with eyes. Not for Internal use.
